review: It is a great help in studies. Especially the flip mode, once the timer is set you are supposed to flip your phone or the pomodora will turn off. This really helps with tackling distractions. Overall really great app. It's only my second day but I am already very impressed.

I've used it for a few hours and so far I'm loving it! Helps me focus on a single task, one pomodoro at a time. I'll be using this app regularly. Edit: Alright, in my previous edit I was unfairly harsh and reduced rating to 2 because I didn't know I was using a free trial of premium. But I really love the app now, even with the limited free version. It has a great design, and the integration of pomodoro with to-do is just beautifully perfect. Will definitely upgrade to premium someday.

The features of this app are really amazing. This app has everything required. Maintaining logs and statistics as well. But one big problem, is that it keeps crashing. After my study session I come to see that the timer stopped in the middle and no record is mentioned of anything. That's annoying and because of this I'm not able to maintain my stats to analyze my day. Please fix it.

One of the best apps available on productivity. I have been trying out different apps on the subject. Luckily, I stumbled upon this app. The features available are apt for anyone seeking to minimize digital distraction and thus achieve one's optimal potential. Enjoying every bit of the features available. Only one issue is that, the premium subscription is bit over priced for students. But overall, it will be worth an investment. Five ‚≠ê.

It's a good app. It HAS boosted my efficiency. I use it for studying purposes. it needs to have a few minor adjustments tho. needs a little tweaking. example: when i have set a task, and I do my 25 mins + 5 mins brk, then that task should be shown as completed automatically instead of me having to manually click on it. well inshort, the team have made a very good and reliable app. thanks

It is a great app that helps you focus. It is very simple to operate. And my favourite feature is that the timer works only when your phone is turned over and that us very helpful and phone is a prime source of distraction. But if you flip it the the timer restrarts. And during the break the timer works while using the phone. You can write in here and keep things as reminder efficiently. You can also listen to music which helps you focus. I would be really happy if we could input our own songs.

I loved the app and purchased the free version. I use the windows version on my computer and recently installed the android version. Now for the last 2 weeks, my progress is not getting saved accurately on my windows version. It is extremely disheartening when you have put in loads of Pomodoros in a day, and none of it is saved the next day including thr completed task. I want to give you 5 stars. Please fix the issue.

Best app. Works properly. No issues of ads even if I am not a premium member. You can even sign in and I think it would give further good options(I haven't done it yet). Perfect app for students. If u are gonna take the phone after setting time, it will start vibrating and that will just make us to keep the phone back. (Psychological moveüòÇ). Also you can block the apps to which you are kinda addicted and there is an option to set music too.I just loved this!

I recommend this app for students like me because it has made me very productive and much more inspired to study. It has all the features like a plant that grows when you study, to do list, pomodoro timer and even more. The only reason why I put 4 stars is because I wanted to request the developers to enable the reminder feature for free because the premium is too overpriced and I cannot purchase it. The reminder feature which reminds you about tasks is essential for us students. Thanks üòä

It's a very good app- especially the wide variety of white noise options ..but I'd like to point out a few things...firstly the icon for the timer (one of the three icons at the bottom of the screen ) has no purpose- couldn't figure out it's use..secondly the free version expires really soon taking away the most of the white noise options..before I could explore which feature suits my method n mood ..you need to let us have it for a while to be able to like it

This app has a very good interface and really great way of presenting reports. I have a few missing items due to which it gets a star less: 1. There's no support for repeating tasks. I have to add the take everyday. 2. There's no variability of time slot per application.This needs to change evey time manually. 3. It's seems to be a Chinese app and I'm worried about data privacy

Helps me run the day smoothly. I like the app lets you create tasks and assign Pomodoros to it. I can keep track of how many Pomodoros I've spent for each task. Also, I can switch between tasks, which is very essential when you are a creative person. Overall, great experience. Just the thing I've been looking for.

It's good. It has white noise and stuff...it lets you focus. You can't access any other app if you are studying and you can only when you are on break(which is the main point). You can also disable some distracting apps(like YouTube). You got your progress(daily progress...). It's a cool app for people who can't focus on studying.

Perfect for pomodoro timer. If you mainly focus on timer, this is best one. It has music for work time and breaks which is ideal. I don't know about the tasks thing because I don't use that but overall good experience. Definitely recommend Edit:Timer is not working, I play it in the background in notification in my phone cause I need to use YouTube, after sometime it resets and I lose all my progress, removed 1 star

The app is good. But there are a few issues. 1. Please provide an option to pause/stop the timer directly from notification panel rather than going in the app and then pausing/stopping it. It would save our time. 2. The app doesn't work in landscape mode so it's a bit of a problem to work in tablet

This app is pretty good. It has a timer for focus and also, while you are at work, it won't let you to use distracting apps which is great! We can also put our to- do list and also plan for the upcoming days. I would definitely recommend you to download this app. But one small problem. I am using a tablet and it would be more convenient if the app could come in landscape mode. Other than this, the app is great!

Very useful Pomodoro, with the ability of To-do list. Feedback: 1. I would like to use it for Time-boxing as well, you could add more features there for adding tasks and tracking 2.Like the Flip Timer it already has, I wish the dev can also had a Pomodoro timer display like how it looks in TimeTimer, like an analogue clock where the remaining time is shown in red.

One year later review: This was the app I was looking for and continue to be happy with my decision to purchase. I am a medical student who wanted a To-do list, organizer, and pomodoro timer to serve as my one stop shop. Focus To-Do works great for that. It's efficient, easy to understand, and minimalist. There's no syncing with my email or background organizing I have to worry about. It just does what I tell it to. Very satisfied!

Have used it for a while and really enjoy the set up and organization. Would love for them to update their desktop version and add a calendar view since it's great to plan short term things but not really comfortable to plan things on the long term or check future engagements. But I love the group system, the tracking, the personalization and tags and the options.

This app has been awesome so far. No ads and I really love the breakdowns of my goals. To be able to see monthly goals/tasks I have completed keeps me wanting to complete more goals which in turn helps me feel like I am taking control of my life and not living on autopilot. Also the ability to sync between a computer and phone is really helpful

I have been using this app to help me regulate myself when revising. So far i love it! With the pomodoro method it ensures that i take a break which honestly saved me from back pain because i would usually study for long hours without breaks. I find studying easier now while listening to classical music. So, if you're like me i would definitely recommend plus it's easy to use!

My new favourite productivity app!!!! I wish I had found this app sooner but I am so grateful that I have this. This is a prime example or using your phone to your advantage. Brilliant app, simple, yet so effective. Love it. I used to use my timer app on my phone and the forest app, but this is hands down the best one out there, and it's free! Amazing! I especially loved the 'flip-phone' feature, astonishing!!! Nevermind, I didn't realise I had the free trial of premium.. now it's over.

I use this extensively to focus on knitting projects, especially when I have deadlines. I like the analysis function as well that provides a recap of what time was spent on what projects. Best of all, I play music of my choice as an accompaniment. How to explore variously modes eventually.

I downloaded the app all was going very smoothly I explored a lot of features and those were commendable but suddenly one day it said that all the main features could not be used and you have to go for the premium version I did not like it and I felt like cheated if you don't want to give those features to customers then why showing them and allowing to use them in the first place even all the main and basic pomodoro features along with task management stopped it made me very disappointed.
Pomodoro on your phone. Works well and doenst have annoying ads. Did everything I wanted to. My only very slight nitpick is the UI, but it's still very readable and usable. Doesn't lag etc.

lot but I think you could just add an option to change the theme the colours and the fonts and and the white sound I don't know what it's called but the white sound I think you can change I mean add a few sounds to that to make it more realistic it was good the app was really great

Fantastic app overall. Bought the premium. However, I'm unable to change the theme of the entire app to dark mode. Also it would be great if a start/stop button was added into full screen mode instead of having to exit it to start or stop. If this feature is added this review will be bumped up to 5 stars.

Love the app in general, but I was charged twice for lifetime. Shouldn't have been able to do that, and I don't see a method to get a refund for the second charge. I found a "help" page with an email. assuming that's adjusted i'll edit my review, but this definitely will impact my opinion of this app.

It brings a nice combination of pomodoro worth to do list, what I hope they will make is the simple ability to add tasks without having to "click make new task" again. With Microsoft I can place down tasks somewhat rapid fire

This app is a must have for anyone else who struggles wirh ADHD and smart phone addiction. It forces me to focus by locking access to other apps. My favorite feature is the estimated pomodoro because it really helps with time blindness. Being able to compare how long a task actually takes with my inaccurate guesses has helped me to block out more reasonable amounts of time. It's also super cheap considering it replaced my pomodoro app, to-do list app, white noise app and app blocker!
The best task list in terms of synching between platforms. Tasks are shows on both the pc and the cellphone almost instantly. Notifications work like they should. Would definitely recommend

I've tried a million different Pomodoro timers with every sort of interface and gamification imaginable, and this has been the only one to work for me. I love being able to set an amount of time for a task and work on it throughout the day, and the ability to repeat tasks on a schedule for things I have to do every week is awesome.

It's a better app than those found in play store. This one is user friendly and easy going, even for a free user like me with this version.but I would like to say if the plant section/sunrise collection feature could be improved such as staying sunrise for 2/3 days or a week (even better) or if there will be a option for switch of the pop up notification of this feature.... cause it seems distracting me sometimes...

its very useful, it doesnt take much effort to use, theres no complicated options or features, just a planner and a timer and i think the sounds were a nice touch, i would suggest some background music as well, for example some classical options, but not having them would be fine either way. i would highly recommend it to anyone who wants something simple but useful.

Well for me it's a good idea for you to click that install button because it enables you to make adjustments to the amount of time y want your Pomodoro to have and u would be like working with purpose or so they write task and also listening to some sounds of your choice go for it bro it's a good one I have been using it for a Month now and no ads while using the free version

It's a pretty good app at my opinion. A senior brother who is in BUET suggest me to use it.He said this kind of app is able to be a turning point in someone's successful career.It's been a few days I started to use it and I'm already getting quite some benefits.I totally suggest one to use this,if he wants to focus in study.

Dang! A great app to use. It's my second day of using, but it already impressed me to write a review. Helps you to focus on studies or your work. There's even a feature for locking your phone for the time being, locking apps or to exit the app. Really appreciated. Kudos! ü´∂

I have been using this app continuously for the last 4-5 months and it had been working really good. But these days, I set the timer but its doesn't get counted idk what's happening. It's also hanging a lot.

This app is super helpful to me! I have very noticeable ADHD and hyperfocus is a severe problem in my life. This helps me to stop and take a breath, which is immensely valuable in the fight against burnout. It also helps me see things like, "Gee, no wonder you're tired. You spent three hours cleaning. Thank goodness you took breaks or you would be a mess!"

Great app to help me focus. One thing I like about this app over other pomodoro apps is the "strict mode" which I use. It warns you whenever you use a blocked app and threatens to cancel the pomodoro if you don't focus again. Obviously you could ignore it but the little reminder to stop procrastinating is enough for me to remain on task.
